actions.text: On agreeing to the Dunn amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Dunn amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A051) offered by Mr. Dunn.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment numbered 31 printed in Part B of House Report 115-261 to reduce the Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Air Force account by $30 million and increase the Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Air Force to accelerate deployment of Air Force Major Range Test Facility Base (MRTFB) open-air range capabilities in the Eastern Gulf.
purpose: An amendment numbered 31 printed in Part B of House Report 115-261 to reduce the Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Air Force account by $30 million and increase the Research, Development, Test and Evaluation, Air Force to accelerate deployment of Air Force Major Range Test Facility Base (MRTFB) open-air range capabilities in the Eastern Gulf.
